attributes.action: Lobby La seda de Barcelona reconsider paying Artenius workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the government to ask   La Seda de Barcelona the parent company of Artenius uk at Wilton on Teesside to reconsider it's refusal to pay the sacked 137 workers when the company was place into administrationon Monday 27th July  their contractual redundancy/severence payments. La Seda continues to trade.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
